title: [GAMEPLAY] Lux's Elementalist skin does not change right
body: On Elementalist {{champion:99}} , upon evolving her skin for a second time, it does not do it right. Upon first having evolved I had taken the Nature element. It was all fine, no biggie there. However, when  the second time where I were able to evolve the skin, and I chose water to create Storm, the skin instead gave me the Water one which you receive from the first time you evolve, and not the final Storm which I chose.

replies.body:
Hey! 

Thanks for the report. There was some under the hood stuff changed this patch, which resulted in this HUD issue. :c There's a fix on PBE that'll go out next patch. Thanks for your patience. <3

I think Storm is actually Fire and something else, Water and Nature are actually the purple fairy...while nature is the green fairy. Water skin is my favorite and it looks more like Storm than the fairy skins IMO.

> You always start on Light form. Once you have collected enough energy you can choose between Fire, Water, Air and Nature. After that you can combine your choice with another element (you cannot choose the same element again).
> Possible compinations:
> -Fire + Water = Dark
> -Fire + Air = Storm
> -Fire + Nature = Magma
> -Water + Fire = Dark
> -Water + Air = Ice
> -Water + Nature = Mystic
> **-Air + Fire = Storm**
> -Air + Water = Ice
> -Air + Nature = Dark
> -Nature + Fire = Magma
> -Nature + Air = Dark
> -Nature + Water = Mystic
